channel.title: Ai on ShootBird
channel.description: Recent content in Ai on ShootBird

item.title: How to ask questions about an AI/ML claim
item.description: Table of Contents Mental model Questions to ask Misc Tip Joi Ito’s opening address at the The Ethics and Governance of AI conference, 3 Feb 2018, is a good primer on the current AI landscape. He goes into how he thinks about AI and the industry’s recent developments. AI is not magic. Movies have overwrought this idea that we’re making silicon and metal equivalents of the human brain that can talk, think, and act like us.
